chunk:
Naturopathica Aloe Replenishing Gel Mask  (2018 formulation)

Brand: Naturopathica

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Linseed Extract*, Sclerotium Gum, Leuconostoc Ferment Filtrate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Seed Extract*, Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola) Extract*, Crithmum Maritimum Extract, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract*, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Fruit Extract, Pyrus

(Rice) Seed Extract*, Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola) Extract*, Crithmum Maritimum Extract, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract*, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Communis (Pear) Extract*, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizinate, Diglycerin, Pinus Pinaster

Directions: Apply a thin layer to clean skin. Leave on for 10 minutes, morning or evening. Rinse. Repeat daily as needed. For an enhanced cooling effect, store in refrigerator. For added hydration, mix with a pea size amount of Carrot Seed Soothing Facial Oil or Rosehip Seed Regenerating Facial Oil. Apply to clean skin. Leave on overnight. Rinse.
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
